Pre-Game Insights: USA team enters the series with a strong sense of assurance, having secured a commanding 4-0 victory against Canada in the previous month
Bangladesh will arrive in the USA following a successful 4-1 series triumph over Zimbabwe
Harmeet Singh emerged as a game-changing all-rounder with outstanding bowling skills, clinching the Player of the Series title for his six wickets at an impressive average of 12.55 per dismissal
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series will mark the inaugural encounter between the two teams in T20I cricket
The upcoming series will serve as valuable preparation for the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup
USA Cricket has shared the following information related to Match Tickets: General admission: $15, Party stand: $40 (includes beer and soft drinks)
Others: The USA will aim to leverage their home advantage and continue their winning momentum
Bangladesh is anticipated to be the favored team at the start of the series
Both teams boast a mix of seasoned players and exciting young talent

USA Cricket is the National Federation for cricket in the United States as recognized by the International Cricket Council
USA Cricket’s mission is to govern, regulate, develop and promote all forms of cricket at all levels in the United States
